pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants, and shoes plus socks.

Safety_Information.general_Info: KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eyes open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, and then continue rinsing. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow. Do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by a poison control center or doctor. Do not give anything to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing. Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Inhaled: Move person to fresh air. If person is not breathing, call 911 or an ambulance, and then give artificial respiration, preferably mouth-to-mouth if possible. Call a poison control center or doctor for further treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor or going for treatment.
